name: TFDV data analyzer Python flex template
description: TFDV data analyzer Python flex template

parameters.name: bq_project_id
parameters.label: Source BigQuery project ID.
parameters.helpText: ID of the project where BigQuery dataset and table are stored

parameters.name: query
parameters.label: BigQuery select
parameters.helpText: BigQuery select for source data to be analyzed and validated

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.label: Start time.
parameters.helpText: A time window start time in YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS format.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.label: End time.
parameters.helpText: A time window end time in YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS format.

parameters.name: output_path
parameters.label: Output path.
parameters.helpText: The output GCS path for stats and anomalies protobufs.

parameters.name: schema_file
parameters.label: Schema file.
parameters.helpText: A GCS path to schema file.

parameters.name: baseline_stats_file
parameters.label: Baseline stats file.
parameters.helpText: A GCS path to a baseline statistics file.

parameters.name: time_window
parameters.label: Time window.
parameters.helpText: A time window to use for time slice calculations. You must use the m or h suffix to designate minutes or hours.
